data.text: so ya a packed house in @SecondLife Once i get going im confortable and forget about my surroundings. I LOVE MUSIC

On a Virtual World called @SecondLife I sang at an karaoke event! My first song was by @cher if i could turn back time. After i was done, i had asked if anyone else wanted a turn, I ended up giving a Live tribute concert to like 19 other people on the Homesetead.

but still, I WAS SOOOOOOOOOOOO EMBARRASSED! I have such huge stage fright! But when i get going I cant stop. I love it! People can usually hear my joy when i sing! I got a standing ovation for a pat benatar song! I think it was Heartbreaker. It was years ago.

I was literally physically shaking from PURE EMBARRASSMENT! MY FOLKS HEARD ME SING THROUGH OUR PAPER THIN WALLS! I did not emerge from my room for a good 2 hours! even though they said i didnt suck, I did have some singing training when i was younger
